column1: Summary
column63: Custom field ([CHART] Date of First Response)

column1: The 'Revolutionary slider option' in 'Add new' section of 'Posts' field is not working.
column26:
*Description*

The revolutionary slider option for proving any template to the newly created post is not working and showing default.

*Steps To Reproduce*

1.Go to posts

2.Go to Add New

3. Create a new post by providing title any description

4.Click on revolutionary slider option.

*Expected Result*

The Revolutionary slider option should open a variety of templates option.

*Actual Result*

The slider option is not showing any templates option and instead showing default.

!image-20210908-034150.png|width=268,height=248!

column1: Verify when the user creates a new post in 'Add New' section of 'Posts' field,the user is able to use revolutionary slider option for giving any template to the post.
The 'Publish immediately' field under the 'publish' section is taking previous dates.
column26:
*Description*

The ‘Publish immediately’ field is accepting previous dates.

*Steps to Reproduce*

# Go to the Real Estate application.
# Go to the Posts
# Go to the Add New
# Write title and description
# Select date from publish immediately field

*Expected Result*

The ‘Publish Immediately’ field should take current and future dates.

*Actual Result*

The ‘Publish immediately’ field  is accepting past dates

!image-20210907-113808.png|width=522,height=468!

column1: Verify all functionality such as status, visibility and publish immediately fields under 'Publish' section of the 'Posts' field
As a user I should be able to use the 'Publish' functionality in order to post any new document in 'Add New' section of 'posts' field.
The 'Delete' functionality in tags/category section of Posts field shows wrong validation message ''Something went wrong".
column26:
*Description*

On clicking the ‘Delete’ functionality instead of deleting the selected item, it shows wrong validation message ‘something went wrong’ and the item  gets deleted only after refreshing the page.

*Steps to Reproduce*

# Go to the Real Estate application.
# Go to the posts section
# Go to tags/category section.
# Select any item and clicks on delete

*Expected Result*

The selected item should get deleted immediately.

*Actual Result*

Upon clicking the ‘delete’ functionality the page is showing a popup message with ‘something went wrong’ and the item remains as it is and the item gets deleted only after when the page is refreshed.





!image-20210907-094553.png|width=742,height=546!

!image-20210907-094708.png|width=849,height=453!

column1: verify columns such as name, description, slug and count appear in the result page of 'tags/category' section of 'Posts' field.
verify columns such as title, author, categories, tags and date appear in the result page of 'All posts' section of 'Posts' field.
As a user I should be able to see the result/displayed page for 'all posts', 'tags', and 'category' section of the 'posts' field.
Verify when the number of records can be changed for every page
verify that the valid page number must be displayed on every page.
verify on the very last page next button must be disabled.
verify on the very first page previous button must be disabled.
verify when next button is clicked in pagination it must redirect to next page.
verify when previous button is clicked in pagination it must redirect to previous  page.
verify whether the pagination displayed has both previous and next clickable links.
Verify the total number of records i.e.  20 per page as per mentioned in screen option.
As a user I should be able to perform pagination functionality so that I can keep track of the records.
Verify whether the user can use search functionality only for the columns such as name,  slugs  in the 'Tags/category' section of 'Posts' field.
Verify whether the user can use search functionality only for name column in the 'All posts' section of 'Posts' field.
Verify whether the admin can perform bulk action 'Delete permanently' or 'Empty trash' functionality in 'Trash' field to delete posts from trash .
Verify whether the admin can perform bulk action 'Restore' functionality in 'Trash' field to restore posts from trash to all posts section.
As an admin I should be able to perform 'Trash' functionality in 'All posts' section of 'posts' field .
Verify when the user clicks on undo functionality the admin is able to get back the deleted post.
As a user I should be able to perform the 'Undo' functionality in the 'All Posts' section of 'posts' field so that I can retrieve the deleted post whenever required.
Verify whether the user is able to delete any particular tags or category as per requirements.
As a user I should be able to use 'delete' functionality so that I can delete any tags or category as per choice.
Verify when the user makes necessary modifications to any field and doesn't clicks on update option, then the user is not able to see the updated list.
Verify when the user clicks on 'update' option, the user is able to update posts, tags and category as per choice and the updated changes should be visible in the list..
As a user I should be able to use the update functionality in order to make any changes to the posts,tags or category section
Verify when the user clicks on 'View' option, the user is able to view posts, tags and category as per choice.
As a user I should be able to use the view functionality so that I can view posts, tags and category which redirects to the corresponding view page.
Verify when the user clicks on quick edit option ,the user is able to edit name and slug of that tag and not the entire description.
Verify when the user clicks on edit option ,the user is able to edit name, slug and description of that tag.
As a user  I should be able change/modify any tags under the tag section of 'Posts' field.
Verify when the user clicks on quick edit option ,the user is able to edit name and slug of that category and not the entire description.
Verify when the user clicks on edit option ,the user is able to edit name, slug, parent category and description of that category.
As a user I should be able to change/modify category of a post under the 'Category' section of 'Posts' field
Verify whether Quick Edit functionality is able to modify date, category, title and all other functionalities available there.
Verify whether the user is able to add media/upload file to edit post section.
Verify whether all the functionality under 'Edit' option is working or not
Verify when the user clicks on edit option ,the user is able to edit the name & add/update any description related to that post.
As a user I should  be able to modify posts under 'All Posts' section in 'Posts' fields.
Verify when the user will serach for any string related to posts,tags or categories , all the related results for that string along will be displayed.
As a user I should be able to perform search functionality for searching any posts,categories and new tags.
Verify when the user selects a particular date and category both and applies filter,the user can get access to all posts under that search.
Verify when the user selects a particular category and applies filter,the user can get access to all posts under that category.
Verify when the user selects a particular date and applies filter,the user can get access to all posts under that date.
Verify whether 'All Dates' & 'All Category' dropdown are accessible or not.
As a user I should be able to perform filter functionality in 'All Post' field for the Posts section
Verify whether the user can perform bulk 'Edit' functionality which edits more than one post as per categories,tags,comments,author and status.
Verify whether the user can perform bulk 'Move to Trash' functionality which deletes more than one posts at a time.
Verify whether the user can perform bulk action functionality for Null selection
verify whether the user by clicking on bulk functionality is able to access multiple checkbox options for all post, new tags and new category fields.
As a user I should be able to use the Bulk functionality in posts section for all post,categories and tag fields.
Verify whether the user on clicking add new tag is able to create new tags.
Verify whether the user on clicking add new category is able to create new categories.
Verify whether the add post functionality takes image or alphanumeric characters or both
As an user I should be able to create new post,add new tags and add new categories.
